nodes.text: The Gilad Pellaeon was an Imperial Remnant Star Destroyer named after the deceased Supreme Commander and Head of State, Gilad Pellaeon. It was Head of State Jagged Fel's flagship. It was dark grey and larger than most other classes of Star Destroyers (but much smaller than the Super-class Star Destroyer).

In 43.5 ABY, it received a diplomatic delegation from the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances. Bothan Senator Tiurrg Drey'lye of the Senate Unification Preparations Committee met with Imperial Remnant Head of State Jagged Fel on the Gilad Pellaeon prior to the Unification Summit. It was later abandoned by her crew in 44 ABY during the Battle over Exodo II after number of direct hits by Baradium missiles, and was subsequently destroyed.
